params._stalePriceTimeout: The maximum time (in seconds) a price feed can be considered valid.

getPrice(address).details: Includes security checks for stale or invalid prices.

params._asset: The address of the asset's token.

returns._0: price The price of the asset in USD, with 18 decimals.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAuthorization(address,bool).details: Only the owner (governance) can call this function.

setPriceFeed(address,address).details: Only the owner (governance) can call this function.

params._asset: The address of the asset's token.
params._feed: The address of the Chainlink price feed contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

PRICE_DECIMALS().notice: The number of decimals to which all prices will be standardized.

STALE_PRICE_TIMEOUT().notice: Maximum period (in seconds) a price can be stale before it's considered invalid.

getPrice(address).notice: Gets the latest price of an asset, standardized to 18 decimals.

isAuthorized(address).notice: Mapping of addresses authorized to call the `getPrice` function.

setAuthorization(address,bool).notice: Authorizes or de-authorizes an address to call the `getPrice` function.

setPriceFeed(address,address).notice: Sets or updates the price feed address for an asset.
